name: static-server
description: Static file server using Koa2 and TypeScript

scripts.start: npm run build:server && npm run build:endless && npm run copy:dist && node dist/app.js
scripts.copy:dist: rm -rf static/* && cp -r ../endless_v2/dist/* static/ && mkdir -p static/assets && cp -r ../endless_v2/assets/* static/assets/
